Personal Website.description:
Developed a dynamic web application with a deployment using S3 and CloudFront.

Integrated serverless functions with AWS Lambda and API Gateway, and utilized DynamoDB for backend storage.

Implemented a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment, including backend testing for reliability and stability, through GitHub Actions

Employed AWS SAM (Serverless Application Model) for Infrastructure as Code (IaC).

SSO Integration.description:
Created a boilerplate template for integrating an Express.js API with Google Single Sign-On and JWT authentication using Passport.js.

Designed the template to be extensible for additional sign-in options (e.g., Facebook, Twitter).

Conducted testing for API endpoints using Chai and Supertest

Goodreads Review Prediction.description:
Scraped data of all books that contain the top-rated tags from Goodreads using Python libraries BeautifulSoup and Selenium.

Pandas and NumPy are used to create data visualization and process raw data.

Utilized SentimentAnalyzer, FastText, Tokenizer, and Lemmatizer to create new variables that aid in the prediction of review popularity.

Optimized XGBoost and Logistic Regression models by varying their parameters with GridSearch to obtain the highest possible accuracy

NER and Question Classification.description:
Designed and developed a window-based NER model in Keras with LSTM. Implementing dropout regularization to enhance accuracy and reduce overfitting.

Created custom preprocessing pipelines for tokenization, casing encoding, and one-hot label encoding.

Employed early stopping and custom callbacks, including F1 score evaluations, to optimize model performance during training

TripSmart.description:
Collaborated with a team of five members utilizing GitHub to develop high-quality software solutions using React Native and implementing the MVC design pattern.

Deployed multiple API Endpoints, including Google Maps API, and utilized the Flask framework to obtain data.

Produced comprehensive documentation outlining all functional requirements.
